title: Gout Lovers
description: Two young lovers are at a crossroads of their relationship, as the thing that brought them together is the very thing that’s keeping them apart: their severe gout.
quote: They say even the wind hurts when you have gout.
altHero: a Korean man and woman sit in the park and the woman recoils in pain
alt1: the man and woman gaze at each other
alt2: the man places his hand gently on the woman’s shoulder
alt3: the couple walk happily down the street
alt4: both of them recoil in pain, holding their arms
